skins.selfIntroduction: I'm a state-of-the-art aircraft carrier with extra reinforced armor. Just look at my flight deck and enclosed hangar. Amazing, aren't they? Hmm? What's this about carrying capacity and firefighting systems? Never mind that... Tell me, what do you think of my... body?
skins.acquisition: This heat, and this throbbing... We meet at last, my dear Commander! I am Taihou, unworthy as I am, at your service?
skins.login: Would you like to take a bath with me? Maybe you'd like to taste me? Orrr~ would you like to do it with me...? Ahahaha!
skins.details: I belong to you, my Commander, body and soul...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hehehe, I would pull the moon from the sky for you, if you wanted it, my Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle2: You like small ones, my Commander? Then I'm off to cull the big ones, hehehe...
skins.secretaryIdle3: My Commander, you know you can never EVER lie to me. Or else...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If you touch any other girls like this, I might have to punish you, my Commander.

skins.shipDescription: You're taking so long to dress yourself, my Commander. Are you struggling to find something to match my dress? Hehe, it doesn't matter what you wear, you're always perfect to me?
skins.acquisition: You're taking so long to dress yourself, my Commander. Are you struggling to find something to match my dress? Hehe, it doesn't matter what you wear, you're always perfect to me?
skins.login: I've been waiting for you, my Commander.
skins.details: Oh, how I envy you, kitty. If I were you, my Commander could hold me tight and never let go.
skins.secretaryIdle1: My Commander, you just stole a glance at another girl, didn't you?
skins.secretaryIdle2: My Commander, if I were to drink a little too much, do you think you could take me home?
skins.secretaryIdle3: My Commander, it's safe for you to attack me when no one's around~
skins.secretaryTouch: My Commander, how would you like to go for a stroll somewhere private?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Yesss, that's it, my Commander, give all your love and attention to Taihou alone...

skins.shipDescription: Hehehe, I let Christmas and New Year's slip right by me, that I might use the Dragon Empery's Lunar New Year to capture my Commander's attentions... Oh, My Commander, won't you please enjoy the show I've prepared for you?
Do I make a nice race queen, my Commander...? Hehe. With these proportions, and my fantastic outfit~? The others couldn't hope to compare with me!
skins.acquisition: Do I make a nice race queen, my Commander...? Hehe. With these proportions, and my fantastic outfit~? The others couldn't hope to compare with me!
skins.login: My Commander, would you like a picture of me? Oh, not for promotional purposes, just for your "personal use..." Hehehe?
skins.details: Would my Commander like to race? I would be happy to take care of the other racers to make sure you win first place... Oh... But why not?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I don't care about prideful things like which carrier group I'm in. All that matters is that I'm willing to do anything for you, my Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I could wait here for you forever, my Commander. But of course I would be happier to be at your side~ If you would let me... Oh, even if you don't want me to, I could still be at your side anytime?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hehehe, the "race queen" is another of the Sakura Empire's great inventions~ Save your wonder, my Commander. Just keep your eyes fixed on Taihou?
skins.secretaryTouch: I am here just to model for you, my Commander~
